attributes.action: Reconsider spending £900,000 on painting a plane.
attributes.additional_details: Redistribute money to where its needed rather than massaging the fragile egos of our current leader
attributes.background: Spending money on repainting a plane at a time when the economy in many of areas of the country is on its knees is insane. Leave the plane in its current colour!

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
